tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: The spouses of U.S. diplomats in Europe played instrumental roles during WWI. Carolyn Herrick, married to Amb. Myron Herric…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: The spouses of U.S. diplomats in Europe played instrumental roles during WWI. Carolyn Herrick, married to Amb. Myron Herrick, served as President of American Ambulance Women’s Committee & fundraised for relief efforts. Learn about #HeroesofUSDiplomacy: go.usa.gov/xp3FN.
